column4: Hello. Earlier I was recommended to convert my NTFS partitions into FAT32 before installing Ubuntu. I have done so on a 1gb partition of mine now, without any problems. Now I'm trying to perform the same task on a ~170gb large partition, however, my system reboots while creating the index
that's because the maximum partition size of fat32 is around 2 GB
thats funny - people in here said that they had 500gb fat32 partitions
i guess it should work then
